summary: A fast test suite for the Stable Diffusion XL pipeline that incorporates multiple ControlNet modules. It supplies mock components and inputs, initializes model weights, and runs a series of checks covering attention slicing, control guidance toggling, batch‑vs‑single inference consistency, optional component serialization, and xformers‑based attention execution.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and efficiency of the diffusion pipeline before deployment, ensuring that performance optimizations and optional features behave as expected and that regressions are caught early.
